## ChatEventPayloads."CHAT.PLAYER\_MESSAGE" property

Emitted when a message is sent to a specific player.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[ChatEvent.PLAYER_MESSAGE]: {
        player: Player;
        message: string;
        color?: string;
    };
```
